verses.text: \w Then|strong="H6030"\w* Job \w answered|strong="H6030"\w*:

“\w How|strong="H5704"\w* \w long|strong="H5704"\w* \w will|strong="H5315"\w* \w you|strong="H5704"\w* \w torment|strong="H3013"\w* \w me|strong="H5315"\w* \w and|strong="H5315"\w* \w crush|strong="H1792"\w* \w me|strong="H5315"\w* \w with|strong="H5315"\w* \w your|strong="H5704"\w* \w words|strong="H4405"\w*?

\w Ten|strong="H6235"\w* \w times|strong="H6471"\w* \w now|strong="H6471"\w* \w you|strong="H3808"\w* \w have|strong="H3808"\w* \w reproached|strong="H3637"\w* \w me|strong="H3808"\w*; \w you|strong="H3808"\w* shamelessly mistreat \w me|strong="H3808"\w*.
Even if I have truly gone \w astray|strong="H7686"\w*, my \w error|strong="H7686"\w* concerns me alone.

If indeed \w you|strong="H5921"\w* would \w exalt|strong="H1431"\w* \w yourselves|strong="H1431"\w* \w above|strong="H5921"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w* \w and|strong="H1431"\w* use \w my|strong="H5921"\w* \w disgrace|strong="H2781"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w*,

\w then|strong="H3588"\w* \w understand|strong="H3045"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w is|strong="H3588"\w* God \w who|strong="H3588"\w* \w has|strong="H3588"\w* \w wronged|strong="H5791"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w* \w and|strong="H3045"\w* drawn \w His|strong="H5921"\w* \w net|strong="H4686"\w* \w around|strong="H5921"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w*.

\w Though|strong="H2005"\w* \w I|strong="H2005"\w* \w cry|strong="H6817"\w* \w out|strong="H6817"\w*, ‘\w Violence|strong="H2555"\w*!’ \w I|strong="H2005"\w* \w get|strong="H6030"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w response|strong="H6030"\w*; \w though|strong="H2005"\w* \w I|strong="H2005"\w* \w call|strong="H7768"\w* \w for|strong="H7768"\w* \w help|strong="H7768"\w*, there \w is|strong="H4941"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w justice|strong="H4941"\w*.

\w He|strong="H3808"\w* \w has|strong="H5674"\w* \w blocked|strong="H1443"\w* \w my|strong="H7760"\w* \w way|strong="H5410"\w* \w so|strong="H3808"\w* \w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w cannot|strong="H3808"\w* \w pass|strong="H5674"\w*; \w He|strong="H3808"\w* \w has|strong="H5674"\w* veiled \w my|strong="H7760"\w* \w paths|strong="H5410"\w* \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w darkness|strong="H2822"\w*.

\w He|strong="H5921"\w* \w has|strong="H3519"\w* \w stripped|strong="H6584"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w* \w of|strong="H7218"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* \w honor|strong="H3519"\w* \w and|strong="H7218"\w* \w removed|strong="H5493"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w crown|strong="H5850"\w* \w from|strong="H5493"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* \w head|strong="H7218"\w*.

\w He|strong="H3212"\w* tears \w me|strong="H3212"\w* \w down|strong="H5422"\w* \w on|strong="H3212"\w* \w every|strong="H5439"\w* \w side|strong="H5439"\w* \w until|strong="H6086"\w* \w I|strong="H3212"\w* am \w gone|strong="H3212"\w*; \w He|strong="H3212"\w* uproots \w my|strong="H5439"\w* \w hope|strong="H8615"\w* \w like|strong="H6086"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w tree|strong="H6086"\w*.

\w His|strong="H5921"\w* anger \w burns|strong="H2734"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w*, \w and|strong="H2734"\w* \w He|strong="H5921"\w* \w counts|strong="H2803"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w* \w among|strong="H5921"\w* \w His|strong="H5921"\w* \w enemies|strong="H6862"\w*.

\w His|strong="H5921"\w* \w troops|strong="H1416"\w* advance \w together|strong="H3162"\w*; \w they|strong="H5921"\w* construct \w a|strong="H3068"\w* ramp \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w* \w and|strong="H1870"\w* \w encamp|strong="H2583"\w* \w around|strong="H5439"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* \w tent|strong="H2583"\w*.

\w He|strong="H4480"\w* \w has|strong="H3045"\w* \w removed|strong="H7368"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* brothers \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w*; \w my|strong="H5921"\w* \w acquaintances|strong="H3045"\w* \w have|strong="H3045"\w* abandoned \w me|strong="H5921"\w*.

\w My|strong="H3045"\w* \w kinsmen|strong="H7138"\w* \w have|strong="H3045"\w* \w failed|strong="H2308"\w* \w me|strong="H7911"\w*, \w and|strong="H3045"\w* \w my|strong="H3045"\w* \w friends|strong="H3045"\w* \w have|strong="H3045"\w* \w forgotten|strong="H7911"\w* \w me|strong="H7911"\w*.

\w My|strong="H1961"\w* guests \w and|strong="H1004"\w* maidservants \w count|strong="H2803"\w* \w me|strong="H1961"\w* \w as|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w stranger|strong="H2114"\w*; \w I|strong="H1004"\w* \w am|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w foreigner|strong="H5237"\w* \w in|strong="H1004"\w* \w their|strong="H1961"\w* \w sight|strong="H5869"\w*.

\w I|strong="H5650"\w* \w call|strong="H7121"\w* \w for|strong="H7121"\w* \w my|strong="H5650"\w* \w servant|strong="H5650"\w*, \w but|strong="H3808"\w* \w he|strong="H3808"\w* \w does|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w answer|strong="H6030"\w*, though \w I|strong="H5650"\w* \w implore|strong="H2603"\w* \w him|strong="H7121"\w* \w with|strong="H6310"\w* \w my|strong="H5650"\w* own \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w*.

My \w breath|strong="H7307"\w* \w is|strong="H7307"\w* repulsive \w to|strong="H1121"\w* my wife, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w I|strong="H1121"\w* am \w loathsome|strong="H2603"\w* \w to|strong="H1121"\w* my own family.

\w Even|strong="H1571"\w* \w little|strong="H5759"\w* boys scorn \w me|strong="H1696"\w*; \w when|strong="H1696"\w* \w I|strong="H1571"\w* appear, \w they|strong="H1571"\w* deride \w me|strong="H1696"\w*.

\w All|strong="H3605"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* best \w friends|strong="H4962"\w* \w despise|strong="H8581"\w* \w me|strong="H8581"\w*, \w and|strong="H2088"\w* \w those|strong="H3605"\w* \w I|strong="H2088"\w* love \w have|strong="H3605"\w* \w turned|strong="H2015"\w* \w against|strong="H3605"\w* \w me|strong="H8581"\w*.

\w My|strong="H4422"\w* \w skin|strong="H5785"\w* \w and|strong="H1320"\w* \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w* \w cling|strong="H1692"\w* \w to|strong="H1320"\w* \w my|strong="H4422"\w* \w bones|strong="H6106"\w*; \w I|strong="H1320"\w* have \w escaped|strong="H4422"\w* by \w the|strong="H4422"\w* \w skin|strong="H5785"\w* \w of|strong="H6106"\w* \w my|strong="H4422"\w* \w teeth|strong="H8127"\w*.

\w Have|strong="H3027"\w* \w pity|strong="H2603"\w* \w on|strong="H3027"\w* \w me|strong="H5060"\w*, \w my|strong="H3588"\w* \w friends|strong="H7453"\w*, \w have|strong="H3027"\w* \w pity|strong="H2603"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w God|strong="H3027"\w* \w has|strong="H3588"\w* \w struck|strong="H5060"\w* \w me|strong="H5060"\w*.

\w Why|strong="H4100"\w* \w do|strong="H4100"\w* \w you|strong="H3808"\w* \w persecute|strong="H7291"\w* \w me|strong="H7291"\w* \w as|strong="H3644"\w* \w God|strong="H3808"\w* \w does|strong="H4100"\w*? \w Will|strong="H1320"\w* \w you|strong="H3808"\w* \w never|strong="H3808"\w* \w get|strong="H7646"\w* \w enough|strong="H7646"\w* \w of|strong="H7646"\w* \w my|strong="H7291"\w* \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w*?

\w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w wish|strong="H4310"\w* \w that|strong="H5414"\w* \w my|strong="H5414"\w* \w words|strong="H4405"\w* \w were|strong="H5612"\w* \w recorded|strong="H3789"\w* \w and|strong="H5612"\w* \w inscribed|strong="H2710"\w* \w in|strong="H3789"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w book|strong="H5612"\w*,
by an \w iron|strong="H1270"\w* \w stylus|strong="H5842"\w* on \w lead|strong="H5777"\w*, or chiseled \w in|strong="H1270"\w* stone \w forever|strong="H5703"\w*.

\w But|strong="H1350"\w* \w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w know|strong="H3045"\w* \w that|strong="H3045"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* \w Redeemer|strong="H1350"\w* \f + \fr 19:25 \ft Or Vindicator\f* \w lives|strong="H2416"\w*, \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* end \w He|strong="H5921"\w* \w will|strong="H1350"\w* \w stand|strong="H6965"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w earth|strong="H6083"\w*.\f + \fr 19:25 \ft Or on my grave\f*

Even after \w my|strong="H1320"\w* \w skin|strong="H5785"\w* \w has|strong="H1320"\w* been \w destroyed|strong="H5362"\w*, \w yet|strong="H2063"\w* \w in|strong="H1320"\w* \w my|strong="H1320"\w* \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w* \f + \fr 19:26 \ft Or without my flesh\f* \w I|strong="H1320"\w* \w will|strong="H1320"\w* \w see|strong="H2372"\w* God.

\w I|strong="H7200"\w* \w will|strong="H5869"\w* \w see|strong="H7200"\w* \w Him|strong="H7200"\w* \w for|strong="H5869"\w* myself; \w my|strong="H7200"\w* \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* \w will|strong="H5869"\w* \w behold|strong="H7200"\w* \w Him|strong="H7200"\w*, \w and|strong="H5869"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w as|strong="H5869"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w stranger|strong="H2114"\w*. How \w my|strong="H7200"\w* \w heart|strong="H3629"\w* yearns \f + \fr 19:27 \ft Hebrew my kidneys yearn\f* \w within|strong="H2436"\w* \w me|strong="H7200"\w*!

\w If|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w say|strong="H1697"\w*, ‘Let \w us|strong="H3588"\w* \w persecute|strong="H7291"\w* \w him|strong="H4672"\w*, \w since|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w root|strong="H8328"\w* \w of|strong="H1697"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w matter|strong="H1697"\w* \w lies|strong="H1697"\w* \w with|strong="H1697"\w* \w him|strong="H4672"\w*,\f + \fr 19:28 \ft Many Hebrew manuscripts, LXX, and Vulgate; most Hebrew manuscripts with me\f*’

\w then|strong="H4616"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w should|strong="H3588"\w* \w fear|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w sword|strong="H2719"\w* yourselves, \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w wrath|strong="H2534"\w* brings \w punishment|strong="H5771"\w* \w by|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*, \w so|strong="H4616"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w may|strong="H2719"\w* \w know|strong="H3045"\w* \w there|strong="H3045"\w* \w is|strong="H5771"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w judgment|strong="H1779"\w*.”
